movie.title: They Died with Their Boots On
movie.plot: The story follows General George Armstrong Custer's adventures from his West Point days to his death. He defies orders during the Civil War, trains the 7th Cavalry, appeases Chief Crazy Horse and later engages in bloody battle with the Sioux nation.

events.title: Gareth Jones issues a press release about the Soviet famine

movie.title: Mr. Jones
movie.plot: In 1933, Welsh journalist Gareth Jones travels to Ukraine, where he experiences the horrors of a famine. Everywhere he goes he meets henchmen of the Soviet secret service who are determined to prevent news about the catastrophe from getting out. Stalin’s forced collectivisation of agriculture has resulted in misery and ruin—the policy is tantamount to mass murder.

events.title: Alex Birns is killed by Danny Greene

movie.title: Kill the Irishman
movie.plot: Over the summer of 1976, thirty-six bombs detonate in the heart of Cleveland while a turf war raged between Irish mobster Danny Greene and the Italian mafia. Based on a true story, Kill the Irishman chronicles Greene's heroic rise from a tough Cleveland neighborhood to become an enforcer in the local mob.

events.title: Oxford and Cambridge go head to head in the 133rd annual Boat Race

movie.title: True Blue
movie.plot: The story of the year the Oxford and Cambridge boat race changed from a gentleman's race to one where winning was everything.

movie.title: Masterminds
movie.plot: A night guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history.

events.title: Jack Abramoff is sentenced to 70 months in prison

movie.title: Casino Jack
movie.plot: Based on a true story, a hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protégé go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
